title: As We Remain - Chapters & Choices EP
description:
AS WE REMAIN 

Swedish Hardcore/Metalcore Founded in 2011
Check out our new EP: "Chapters & Choices"

As We Remain is a hardcore metal band formed in the year of 2011 from VÃƒÂ¤sterÃƒÂ¥s in Sweden, Influences stretch all the way from the original New York Hardcore scene to the Metalcore of today. The result is a more "straight forward" type of hardcore/metalcore with simple breakdowns, heavy riffing and a very harsh sound in general.

Most of the productions and recordings have been made by the band at no cost at all, which has resulted in the new EP: "Chapters & Choices" along with our music-video "One Of A Kind".
